name: RATSCAPE (Tenrose)
description:
You've just escaped an animal testing unit; what were they testing you for? You don't know. Who cares. You just want to taste sweet skateboarding freedom of the outside city world.

Prototype 2D platformer. This was my final for a 2D Game Design course. Scripted everything myself, and it was my first time scripting in C#. To be updated, but honestly this made me realize I hate Unity so I'll probably be switching everything to Godot.
